title: Where can I get Brush Stroke Fast?
content:
Hi!  
I found the font Brush Stroke Fast at [http://hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/brshskfst.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100913061754/http:/hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/brshskfst.html "http://hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/brshskfst.html") but no way of buying it.  
I have mailed Pat Snyder, but no answer yet :-/  
Does anyone know where/how I can buy this font? I need it desperately!

Thanx!

-GG
author: guttorm.gorm

comments.content:
If you are in a hurry you could try to see in dafont.com one alternative.  
They have some nice brush fonts [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100913061754/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=604).

Ant√≥nio

I have been there, but I need "Brush Stroke Fast" or a font looking exactly the same.  
Thanks anyway!

-GG

if you go to his "fonts main" link on the page you referenced, all his contact info is there.

[http://hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100913061754/http:/hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/index.html "http://hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/index.html")
